name: Getting Down: A Getting Up Demake
name_original: Getting Down: A Getting Up Demake
description:
Getting Down is an NES-styled demake of one of my favorite games, Marc Ecko's Getting Up: Contents Under Pressure. I did everything on it but the music for Retro Jam 2021. It took about a week. It's definitely still got some rough spots and things I'd like to work on but for my experience, I'm really proud of what I put together by myself in such a short time. Hope you enjoy! 

In this game, find cans of spray paint and tag as much of the city as you can before finding the exit! Are you a toy or a legend?

***TIP*** If you're having trouble spray painting make sure you have a can and try walking back and forth while hitting the tag button. Didn't have time to work the kinks out before submission!

Generic Controller support is here but I didn't test it much.

Keyboard Controls:

            WASD - Movement

            Space - Jump

             Keypad [0] or LMB - Tag

Music:

"Bit Bossa" by Azure Flux

https://www.youtube.com/user/azuremakingsound
